projects: [{"title":"Constructed an α-maximizing option strategy in a multidimensional setting","start_date":"Jul 2016","description":"• Derived a trading strategy writing options with continuous range of strikes which maximizes the alpha of the achieved excess returns controlling of the risk• Hedged out sensitivity to market movements to ensure that the generated alpha is generated by our trading strategy only• Back tested the strategy by investing in a portfolio of European call options on multiple benchmark assets during different sub-periods of 2005-2013"},{"title":"Comovement Analysis on major stock market indices and commodities","start_date":"Feb 2015","end_date":"Apr 2015","description":"• Tested contagion based on two time series windows, which are before and after bankruptcy of Lehman Brothers Bank.• Analyzed the wavelet coherence of examined time series, to see the comovement in the frequency and time domain at the same time, results indicate that stock market indices are highly correlated, especially on low frequencies. • Studied causal relations between stock market indices and commodities by Granger causality test. • Acquired results indicate that majority of stock markets have causal relationship with other."}]
